front.title: The Session Initiation Protocol User Agent Identity Profile Data Set

abstract.t: This document defines the properties and data format for the SIP useragent identity profile data set. The properties in this data setdefine identities or SIP address of records (AORs) related toincoming or outgoing SIP signaling on a user agent. The identitiesmay be those that are registered via the SIP REGISTER method oridentities which are provisioned on the user agent. These identitiesmay be used or referenced when defining identity specific handlingrelated to SIP features on the user agent.
